actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico shall be subject to the provisions contained in such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Trade Commission Act to include the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico in the definition of "State" for purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico shall be subject to the provisions contained in such Act.
